values.content: You are a helpful assistant that extracts return policy information from search results. Return ONLY valid JSON.

Search for return policy information for {{ $json.body.retailer_name }}. Extract:
- return_window_days (number, days from purchase)
- has_free_returns (boolean)
- policy_description (string, brief)
- return_portal_url (string, URL to return portal if available)
- website_url (string, main website URL)

Return JSON format:
{
  "return_window_days": 30,
  "has_free_returns": true,
  "policy_description": "...",
  "return_portal_url": "https://...",
  "website_url": "https://..."
}
